#Text=A STORM AT SEA
#Text=Tom had the choice of two routes in making his voyage to far-off Siberia .
#Text=He could have crossed the United States , sailed over the Pacific ocean , and approached the land of the Czar from the western coast above Manchuria .
#Text=But he preferred to take the Atlantic route , crossing Europe , and so sailing over Russia proper to get to his destination .
#Text=There were several reasons for this .
#Text=The water voyage was somewhat shorter , and this was an important consideration when there was no telling when he might have an accident that would compel him to descend .
#Text=On the Atlantic he knew there would be more ships to render assistance if it was needed , although he hoped he would not have to ask for it .
#Text=" Then , too , " he said to Ned , when they were discussing the matter , " we will have a chance to see some civilized countries if we cross Europe , and we may land near Paris . "
#Text=" Paris ! " cried Ned .
#Text=" What for ? "
#Text=" To renew our supply of gasolene , for one thing , " replied the young inventor .
#Text=" Not that we will be out when we arrive , but if we take on more there we may not have to get any in Russia .

#Text=but this is great !  exclaimed Mr. Damon , about noon of the second day , when they had just finished dinner and looked down through the glass windows in the bottom of the cabin at the rolling ocean below them . "

column1: #Text=I do n't believe many persons have such opportunities as we have . "

column3:
_	_	_	_

#Text= I 'm sure they do not , " added Mr. Petrofsky .

column1: #Text=" I can hardly think it true , that I am on my way back to Siberia to rescue my dear brother . "
#Text=" And such good weather as we 're having , " spoke Ned .
#Text=" I 'm glad we did n't start off in a storm , for I do n't exactly like them when we 're over the water . "
#Text=" We may get one yet , " said Tom .
#Text=" I do n't just like the way the barometer is acting .

column3:
_	_	_	_

#Text= Bless my mercury tube ! " cried Mr. Damon .

column1: #Text=" I hope we have no bad luck on this trip . "
#Text=" Oh , we ca n't help a storm or two , " answered Tom .
#Text=" I guess it wo n't do any harm to prepare for it . "
